div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

td.p: Welcome to the 2019-2020 school year! This is an exciting year with the introduction of our new student information system. Many of you have already experienced our new ParentVUE portal through the registration process. This new portal for families is going to improve how you stay in tune with your students’ school life. We look forward to hearing your feedback, please contact VUEsupport@matsuk12.us or call the IT Call Center at 761-HELP.

Our School Board is excited to serve you and our community. We have a lot to celebrate, our graduation rate continues to increase and we are improving our choice options for families across the Mat-Su. If you are interested in learning more about these options contact our Office of Instruction at 746-9212.
Stay connected with us throughout the school year through our website, MSBSD App, Blackboard Mass Notification, Facebook and Twitter feeds and get the latest information and notifications.
We look forward to seeing you at school!
